main.desc1: Gamix is the first Attention layer between

feature.title: Feature
feature.item1title: Attention Matching: Accurate Reach of High-Value Users
feature.item1content: Gamix reconstructs the logic of traffic distribution: AI assists in building three-dimensional portraits integrating social, behavioral and consumption data, quantifies the attention value of players, and enables advertising budgets to accurately target high-value user groups.
feature.item2title: AI Smart Engine: Zero Trial and Error in Growth
feature.item2content: Based on massive data and testing cases, Gamix has built an AI smart growth engine that conducts full-cycle diagnostics on product initiation, delivery, and operation, while providing professional product solutions and operation plans.
feature.item3title: One-Click Global Access, Focus on Polishing Your Product
feature.item3content: Gamix's mature SDK integrates global payment, deposit & withdrawal, and ad aggregation links, with built-in AI multilingual support and a data analysis backend. Developers only need to focus on the game itself—we clear all localization and commercialization obstacles for you.
feature.item4content: Gamix offers a variety of AI tools, enabling everyone to develop and promote game products with low barriers. Based on the growth flywheel of "attention value + content production", it builds an infinitely expandable ecological moat.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.step1: Precise User Portraits and Efficient Traffic Distribution: Build an AI-driven multi-dimensional user portrait system, launch an "attention value" matching market, and achieve accurate traffic allocation.
roadmap.step2: AI Intelligent Growth Engine: Launch the AI intelligent growth engine to provide professional product and operation services.
roadmap.step3: One-Click Publishing SDK System: Aggregate multi-platform payment, advertising, and other functions.
roadmap.step4: Data and Intelligent Decision-Making Hub: Establish a data analysis center and intelligent decision-making system, integrate AI functions, and optimize automated operations.
roadmap.step5: Standardized Publishing and Scaling: Build a standardized publishing system, expand AIGC and creator economy globally, and reach 5 million DAU.
